document_data.caption: A red wizard putting aura fire to use.
document_data.name: Aura Fire
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aura fire''''' was an [[alteration]] [[spell]] that outlined a target creature or person in a red, glowing light.
document_data.Effects: The spell worked in a similar manner to the [[druid]]ic spell ''[[faerie fire]]''.
document_data.Casting: When casting ''aura fire'', the [[spellcaster]] motioned their hands in a manner that outlined the body of the spell's recipient.
